thread.title: Crime drama Sirai takes ZEE5 by storm with a massive viewership record
thread.title_full: Crime drama Sirai takes ZEE5 by storm with a massive viewership record

author: 123telugu
title: Crime drama Sirai takes ZEE5 by storm with a massive viewership record
text:
20
Sirai, the recent superhit crime drama from Kollywood featuring Vikram Prabhu in the lead role, is creating a sensation after its arrival on OTT. The film is receiving appreciation from every nook and corner for its sensible handling of a sensitive issue.
Sirai has now created a new record on ZEE5, becoming the fastest film to breach 156 million streaming minutes. The movie took just five days to achieve this monstrous milestone. Not just Tamil audiences, Sirai is also gaining appreciation from viewers of other languages.
Produced by S.S. Lalit Kumar under the Seven Screen Studio banner, the film also features L.K. Akshay Kumar, Anishma Anilkumar, and Anantha Thambirajah in significant roles. Justin Prabhakaran composed the music.
summary: Sirai, the recent superhit crime drama from Kollywood featuring Vikram Prabhu in the lead role, is creating a sensation after its arrival on OTT. The film is receiving appreciation from every nook and corner for its sensible handling of a sensitive issue. Sirai has now created a new record on ZEE5, becoming the fastest film to breach 156 million streaming minutes. Produced by S.S. Lalit Kumar under the Seven Screen Studio banner, the film also features L.K. Akshay Kumar, Anishma Anilkumar, and Anantha Thambirajah in significant roles.
